creator: Sebastian.Eisert@gmx.net
text:
Hi,

I've got Problems deleting .svn directories with ANT. These folders can't be 
deleted with as describen in the manual. I discussed the porblem at javacore.de 
(http://forum.javacore.de/viewtopic.php?p=33384#33384)

We came to the conclusion that the fact needs to bee reported as a bug.

I tried to delete the .svn-directories as follows:

=================================================
...
 <delete defaultexcludes="false" includeemptydirs="true">
    <fileset dir="."  includes="**/.svn" />
  </delete>
...
=================================================

Best regards,
Sebastian Eisert

In the manual this scenario is adressed:

  <delete includeemptydirs="true">
    <fileset dir="src" includes="**/.svn" defaultexcludes="false"/>
  </delete>

I retried that and that works for me.
I posted a (German) reply with more steps.
